Class RefBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.irian.ankor.ref.impl.RefBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollectionRef, RefImplementor, MapRef, Ref, TypedRef<Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ELRef

    public abstract class RefBase
extends Object
implements Ref, RefImplementor, CollectionRef, MapRef

        public boolean isAncestorOf(Ref ref)
        Specified by:
        isAncestorOf in interface TypedRef<Object>
        Returns:
        true, if the given Ref is a child (or grandchild, or...) of this Ref

      • propertyName

        public String propertyName()
        Description copied from interface: TypedRef
        Returns the "property" this Ref is referencing. Depending on the actual path node type this can be:
        • the name of a bean property (e.g. refFactory.ref("foo.bar").propertyName() returns "bar")
        • an index (e.g. refFactory.ref("foo.bar[5]").propertyName() returns "5")
        • a literal map key (e.g. refFactory.ref("foo['bar']").propertyName() returns "bar")
        Specified by:
        propertyName in interface TypedRef<Object>
        Returns:
        the name of the (bean) property this Ref is referencing
        See Also:
        PathSyntax.getPropertyName(String)
